title: Introduction
description: Welcome to The Neighborhood School Knowledge Base

body.raw:
The goal of this site is to provide a centralized location for all information related to the PTA. This includes information about our mission, values, and vision, as well as resources for parents, teachers, and students. We hope that this site will be a valuable resource for all members of our community, and we welcome your feedback and suggestions for how we can improve it. This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page or broken links, it means we're still working on it! ## Getting Started Select a topic below to learn more.
### About the PTA Learn about the mission, values, and vision that we embody. ### Board Members Forms, 2023-2024 Calendar, and other helpful resources. ### Committees and Initiatives What we're working towards, and how we organize to get it done. ### Events Everything you need to know about our events and how to get involved. ### Fundraising Grants, merch, donations, and where the money goes. ### PTA Meetings Schedule, 2024-2025 Agenda, archives, and other helpful resources. ### Frequently Asked Questions Updated frequently with answers to common questions. ### Resources Documentation, templates, forms, and external links.
